basics.name: Anthony Metzler
basics.label: Product Development Leader
basics.summary: I like tech and this is my summary.

work.summary: Heading R&D of SaaS solutions for automating workflows and providing technical consultation and development for external clients.
highlights: Prototyping a collection of services to power a mobile-focused inventory management platform.

work.summary: Directly managed 6-10 Engineers, designed UI/UX requirements and prototypes for numerous new applications, enhancements, and fixes. Served as main customer interface and Scrum Master for multiple engineering projects running in parallel. Leader of cross-functional initiatives driving business development.
highlights: Managed the product development of a mobile web and Android application from concept to completion, which supported onboarding new clients resulting in over $50k new MRR.
Oversaw the specification and development of a GraphQL API for integrating multiple platform services.
Developed a Jenkins + Docker CI pipeline for creating release branches, deploying to staging environments, and running test suites â€” this pipeline decreased pre-deployment time by 50%.
Lead customer engagement and product development for supporting vital sales objectives necessary to capture over $200k in potential MRR.

work.summary: As head of Quality Assurance, managed a team of 3-5 QA Engineers in developing test strategies, frameworks, and software quality standards. Acted as the Release Manager responsible for git flow, testing, authoring release notes, and near-daily production deployments. Collaborated upstream with the product team to ensure quality during sprint planning and story elaborations.
highlights: Awarded the ClearCare Hero Award, company wide recognition for excellence.
Directed the completion and operation of a Selenium test framework integrated with Behave BDD, FactoryBoy, and Jenkins; by automating our test strategy it decreased manual testing time by 75%.
Oversaw quality of partner integrations and data, including Harvard Medical, Stanford, industry franchisors, payment processing vendors, and background check providers.

work.summary: Managed a team of QA Testers, responsible for writing test cases, manual testing, and completing 100+ test cases on weekly releases. Oversaw office IT infrastructure such as hardware, networking, and vendors. Served as a cross-functional technical resource and IT Administrator. Managed the verification, triaging, and escalation of all reported issues.
highlights: Documented product enhancements and fixes as well as provided product demos and training.
Acted as the project lead for writing, producing, and deploying product training videos, in order to assist with scaling the customer onboarding and success teams.
Researched, implemented, and administered numerous software solutions, including: Salesforce, Zuora, JIRA, Confluence, LucidChart, Influitive, Adobe Cloud, and more.

work.summary: Lead a team of 3-8 Engineers and Business Development Managers in defining, developing, and completing a B2B SaaS application. Headed business strategy, product design, and operations. Developed websites, user interfaces, and marketing materials.
highlights: Oversaw the development of a cloud POS platform with integrated mobile orders; software application was taken from concept to an operational Beta pilot.
Awarded the Entrepreneurial Award for student affiliated startup by Stetson University.
Completed a round of seed funding for the business.

work.summary: Producer of developing media technologies, music videos, and short films. Managed a team of 3-6 Engineers and Designers, responsible for developing technologies from concept to implementation. Once completed the products were utilized to provide interactive media experiences at concerts and live events.
highlights: Held a variety of roles, including product manager, camera & audio operator, designer, and editor.
Acting Project Lead and Event Coordinator for numerous events and concerts.
